actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 5 of title 5, United States Code, to provide for results based regulations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Results Based Regulations Act of 1994 - Amends Federal civil service law to provide for results based regulations whose general proposal notice includes a statement of: (1) results to be achieved; (2) methods to quantify them; (3) alternative methods to achieve them; and (4) a process for waiving all or part of a regulation if an alternative is subsequently proposed which would have no less of an impact on achievement of those results.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 5 of title 5, United States Code, to provide for results based regulations, and for other purposes.
